Name: You
Text: I'm so sorry, Old Man McLudum...

Name: You
Text: I wish there was something I could do...

Name: You
Text: We only worked together for a few weeks, but you really helped me...

Name: You
Text: You helped me learn how to be responsible...

Name: You
Text: I mean, I'm just a kid... but I want to try and keep this newspaper going. For you.

Name: You
Text: I don't know how... I don't know anything about journalism...

Name: You
Text: Maybe I can't make deliveries today, or tomorrow... but one day...
